label: kind/upgrade-consideration
impact/high
notes.text: Release edge-24.5.4 is not recommended; use edge-24.5.5 instead.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added --token flag to the diagnostics policy command.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added JSON output format support to the linkerd profile command.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Allowed control plane components to specify concurrency.

label: kind/bug-fix
impact/medium
notes.text: Fixed an issue where the initial outbound policy did not contain producer routes.

label: kind/bug-fix
impact/medium
notes.text: Reindexed outbound policy backends when a service changed.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Added support for JSON output in inject and uninject commands.
